title: STAT+: Fulcrum study suggests improved efficacy for higher dose sickle cell pill
description: A higher dose of the experimental pill for sickle cell disease showed more promise, Fulcrum said at the American Society of Hematology annual meeting.
content: A higher dose of the experimental pill for sickle cell disease showed more promise, Fulcrum said at the American Society of Hematology annual meeting.
